ἀφειδ-ία, ἡ,
generosity, liberality, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 unsparing treatment, σώματος[NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
harsh treatment, unsparing
primarily the disposition of one who is ἀφειδής, unsparing; hence, in NT unsparingness in the way of rigorous treatment, non-indulgence, harsh-treatment Col. 2:23*
